topic.title: New Proxy UPDATE - WWW.ZEROCAT.EU, ZEROCAT.EU * 900GB Optional Limit!
topic.body:
I just found this amazing VPS deal for 18eur a month (Bytesized-hosting), thanks to Reddit.
 
**Specifications:**
1000GB HDD storage
2GB RAM
3TB Bandwidth
1GBit connection
3vCPU
RAID-50
Amsterdam location
 
They're apparently very torrent friendly, too, and primarily offer AppBoxes and SeedBoxes, although I had to choose VPS obviously because ZeroNet is still not mainstream for file sharing. You should see how fast it updates zites...
 
This is better than sex. I could marry this server. Happy god-damned birthday indeed. I'll likely request a refund and cancellation for the previous one I made, then do a web redirect from proxy.zerocat.eu straight to zerocat.eu.
 
I suppose I'll also have to rely on mining revenue more than ever, because this will literally cost $7.5NZD a week, and I'm only really living on my student money, but at least now we can share the big files anywhere, introduce normies to ZeroNet and just watch videos to our hearts content, unlike previous proxies like fuckcf.cf (which by the way are now dead).
 
**Business model and mission statement:**
I will be thinking of expanding this in future, so we can literally have another YouTube, too. If I ever earn more from mining revenue than what is needed to pay for the servers, then I will allocate even portions of it to donate to the ZeroNet creators, help pay for my own living expenses, and then also pour some money into cryptocurrency-based Universal Basic Income projects, so we can start alleviating poverty and get rid of wealth inequality. A revolution.

topic.title: Oumuamua - Interstellar space rock, or spaceship?
A Dating Site for 'Neuro-Atypicals' - Concept
0chan Porn. Can I sleep well at night?
topic.body:
This seems to be trending on Zeronet right now. 

Im obviously all for freedom of expression and sexuality.. But something s got me worried. 

On the front page of the site it says We are against censorship. Dont you think this could this be potentially..accidentally.... Giving the green lights to certain types of 'bad apples' making their way into the site?

Should not there also be an age disclaimer....if not for legal reasons ..then maybe Moral ones?

Its also my most seeded site on my proxy. So I'm technically hosting a porn site.

Having said that.. This would all be perfectly cool if the above concerns were addressed.

Thanks

topic.title: Feature request: Proxy.. Submit new site for review
topic.body:
We need a function that submits a site for review every time a new zite address is requested. Duplicate requests for the same site are omitted.

I think its no longer safe to be able to let users add any site they want.. Considering the volume of unregulated porn that has been upload. God forbid a bad seed has ever made its way into the server.

Its not fair own content providers.. And site viewers. If you're hosting porn..again.. Make sure you keep your sites well moderated. And make sure you let visitors know that their site is strictly 18+. That includes the age of the models displayed in the photos

topic.title: Zerocat.eu - down for 24hr maintenance!
topic.body:
Upcoming changes:
- adding sites will submit them for review before being allowed to download.
- coinhive taxman to be more lax and less persistent. Users still need to disable adblock to help pay for this service.

You can thank the frenzy of new porn sites for this. Our worst nightmare s may have been realized. Questionable material MAY exist on Zeronet as we speak..and here at Zerocat were committed to protecting users

1511643117_1PdVrw7boKHUavWTQxD3UaNGM4tx5.body: I'd probably be more worried about obtaining non-perishable food, drinkable water, medical supplies, and getting access to underground shelter.

1511662798_1PdVrw7boKHUavWTQxD3UaNGM4tx5.body:
> [ghostofthepast](#comment_1_1LtFqzCrfXwPYCHH6HJUs8Pv9Zit67iKYw): Ive been depressed and jobless for years. I cant feel anything but numbness. The world is so pointless to me. Its hard to even move around and stand. Im so weak i worry about my health. Suicide is something i think about hourly. Im different than other people. I wasn't meant for this world.

There's hope, never give up. Here at ZeroNet we're all about new technology.. and new technologies will create a new world.

> [styromaniac](#comment_241_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): There are a few here. I've improved my gut flora. That seems to be the only constant. The HRT might be helping as well, at least as of late. [...]

If you don't mind me asking.. are you MtF, or FtM?

> [ghostofthepast](#comment_3_1LtFqzCrfXwPYCHH6HJUs8Pv9Zit67iKYw): Then I'm fucked. It makes me eat like shit. I can barely move if i do get out of bed. I haven't had a single friend in years. I don't travel further than my own room. I don't sleep at night because when i close my eyes i think I'm drowning.

What foods do you normally eat? Hell, even instant noodles can be made more nutritious by simply adding in some canned lentils, spinach, cabbage, mushrooms, carrots, peas, fish.. mussels.. meat, if you eat it. For vitamin C, just get some garlic and then cut up a clove and add that to your noodles, too.
 
Just eat whatever you eat right now, but add stuff to it. Buy frozen or canned vegetables for a start. Then buy garlic because it stores well and is high in vitamin C. (I know eating fruit can be a pain in the ass.. you can also buy frozen fruit if that's an issue!)

1511856741_17ffrcHNzbFoUe81PyMEagQdv2DGN.body: > [styromaniac](#comment_253_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Please switch back to PNG icons. I have no idea why SVG doesn't work, but that's the UI problem I'm having. I've cloned KopyKate BIG and reverted icons back to their PNG counterparts and I can actually see the buttons again. I know what's wrong now. Dumb mistake of mine......   Anywhoo.. all I need to do is convert the SVG to base64, then embed it in the CSS. Some browsers don't allow using .svg in

New short-term To-Do (29/11/2017):
- Finish building File Manager (displays list of actively seeded files, allows delete, select all, etc.).
- Enable editing / deleting comments, enable replies.
- Improved general editing interface thumbnail, description, etc.
- Improved left menu look
- Loading screen for video, showing peers .. downloaded %..etc.
- Perfected video scaling for mobile
- Automatically seed a whole channel (i.e. subscribe)
- Allow upload of thumbnails to ZeroNet.

Long term To-Do:
- HTML5 video with custom player and buttons
- Upvotes for files and/or comments?
- User customized channels
- Improved uploader for ZeroNet Proxy (uploading via proxy is currently disabled, as the proxy currently only has enough space to be a seedbox for files that are lacking in peers. It then automatically deletes files that have tons of peers.)

> [zazing](#comment_10_1AZYSfyeKjZbAN9BPYYFf1FCSm9ujLXMcu): Sometimes the downloading process stops and I have to click the seed button again to continue the download. This happens also on ZeroUP, it's like the big file engine in zeronet pauses it for no reason?

Yep. That's the ZeroNet python, nothing to do with us .. lol
 
I'm guessing it automatically times out if the upload speed of the seeder is too slow.

1513362859_15zSEBpmS1CwXsJjDA5ymFXtoGpsn.body:
The only people responsible for the loss of net neutrality are the American voters.  That's a lot of mummy's and daddy's.. Little brothers and sisters.. coworkers .. maybe even your own family you'd have to witch hunt.

Maybe it's time to accept that society sucks because we allow it to. Most importantly .. Because we are afraid of taking risks..of venturing into uncharted territory. We prefer the safety and comfort that comes with voting conservative/ labour.. Working 9-5  at a job you hate.... .. Staying in toxic relationships... Watching hollywood remakes. The list goes on.

Just because others make those mistake s.. Doesn't mean we never will. Maybe it's time to look in the mirror.
